name: GiardiasisTestsForGiardiaSpeciesAntigen
title: Giardiasis (Tests for Giardia species Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting Giardia antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Giardia Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
